      Stick

      class Camera

      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Inherits From: BaseComponent
      Description:

      This class contains the media manager and playback manager, which manage the camera's media content. It provides methods to change camera settings and perform camera actions. This object is available from the Aircraft or HandHeld object, which is a subclass of BaseProduct.
      此类包含媒体管理器和播放管理器，用于管理相机的媒体内容。它提供了更改相机设置和执行相机操作的方法。此对象可从Aircraft或HandHold对象获得，后者是BaseProduct的子类。

      Class Members:

      State Updates

      General
      method
      setSystemStateCallback
      method setSystemStateCallback
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the camera's system state callback. The onUpdate function has a CameraSystemState object as its parameter.

      Precondition:

      A Callback object must be implemented and passed in as a parameter.

      Postcondition:

      The Callback object that was passed in as a parameter will call its onUpdate function at regular intervals.
      设置相机的系统状态回调。onUpdate函数的参数是CameraSystemState对象。前提条件：回调对象必须实现并作为参数传入。后置条件：作为参数传入的Callback对象将定期调用其onUpdate函数。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable SystemState.Callback updatedSystemStateCallBack The Callback object to set as the callback. <br> Callback implements an onUpdate method.</br> The CameraSDCardState object contains information about the SD card inserted into the aircraft's camera.
      要设置为回调的回调对象
      回调实现onUpdate方法
      CameraSDCardState对象包含有关插入飞机相机的SD卡的信息。
      Exposure
      method
      setExposureSettingsCallback
      method setExposureSettingsCallback
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the callback for updated exposure parameters. The callback's onUpdate method will be called each time the exposure parameters (ISO, Exposure Compensation, Shutter Speed and Aperture) are updated. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      设置更新曝光参数的回调。每次更新曝光参数（ISO、曝光补偿、快门速度和光圈）时，都会调用回调的onUpdate方法。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable ExposureSettings.Callback callback The execution callback.
      执行回调。
      Media
      method
      setMediaFileCallback
      method setMediaFileCallback
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the camera's new generated media file callback.
      Note:Because the firmware cannot return some information correctly, so the interface is deprecated, please use setNewGeneratedMediaFileInfoCallback insteaded.
      设置相机新生成的媒体文件回调。注意：由于固件无法正确返回某些信息，因此接口已弃用，请使用setNewGeneratedMediaFileInfoCallback代替。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable MediaFile.Callback callback The Callback object to set as the callback. The callback's method onNewFile has a MediaFile object as it's parameter from which information about the media type, index, file size and the created time can be obtained.
      要设置为回调的回调对象。回调的方法onNewFile有一个MediaFile对象作为其参数，可以从中获取有关媒体类型、索引、文件大小和创建时间的信息。
      method
      setNewGeneratedMediaFileInfoCallback
      method setNewGeneratedMediaFileInfoCallback
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the camera's new generated media file info callback.
      设置相机新生成的媒体文件信息回调。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable MediaFile.NewFileInfoCallback callback The Callback object to set as the callback. The callback's method onNewFileInfo has a MediaFileInfo object as it's parameter from which information about the media type, index, file size, created time and stream source can be obtained.
      要设置为回调的回调对象。回调的方法onNewFileInfo有一个MediaFileInfo对象作为其参数，可以从中获取有关媒体类型、索引、文件大小、创建时间和流源的信息。
      method
      setTimeLapsePreviewCallback
      method setTimeLapsePreviewCallback
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the generated preview image callback. The callback's onGenerate method will be called each time a photo has been taken.
      设置生成的预览图像回调。每次拍摄照片时都会调用回调的onGenerate方法。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable TimeLapsePreviewCallback generatedTimeLapseCallBack The execution callback.
      执行回调。
      Thermal Temperature
      method
      setThermalTemperatureCallback
      method setThermalTemperatureCallback
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the thermal camera's temperature update callback. Callback is used when there is a new temperature value available for the set spot metering target point. Supported only by thermal imaging cameras with installed firmware version of 1.20.0.00 or higher. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      设置热摄影机的温度更新回调。当设置的点计量目标点有新的可用温度值时，使用回调。仅支持安装固件版本为1.20.0.00或更高版本的热成像相机。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable TemperatureDataCallback updateCenterTemperatureCallback The Callback object to set as the callback. <br> Callback implements an onUpdate method.</br> The Float object contains information about the updated temperature value.
      要设置为回调的回调对象
      回调实现onUpdate方法
      Float对象包含有关更新的温度值的信息。

      Thermal Area Temperature Aggregations

      method setThermalAreaTemperatureAggregationsCallback
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the thermal camera's temperature aggregation update callback. Callback will be called when there are new min, max, and average values available for the set spot metering area. Supported only by thermal imaging cameras with installed firmware version of 1.20.0.00 or higher. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      设置热摄影机的温度聚合更新回调。当设置的点测光区域有新的最小值、最大值和平均值时，将调用回调。仅支持安装固件版本为1.20.0.00或更高版本的热成像相机。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable ThermalAreaTemperatureAggregations.Callback areaTemperatureAggregationsUpdatedCallback The Callback object to set as the callback.
      要设置为回调的回调对象。

      设置热摄影机的外部场景设置更新回调。当更新的外部场景设置可用时，将调用回调。仅支持安装固件版本为1.20.0.00或更高版本的热成像相机。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable ThermalExternalSceneSettings.Callback thermalExternalSceneSettingsUpdatedCallback The Callback object to set as the callback.

      Flat Camera Mode

      Check Flat Camera Mode Supported
      method
      isFlatCameraModeSupported
      method isFlatCameraModeSupported
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Determines if current camera supports Flat Camera Mode. Returns true if the CameraMode and ShootPhotoMode flatten into FlatCameraMode. The FlatCameraMode and setFlatMode can be used to set the camera mode directly. The user does not need to use setMode and setShootPhotoMode to set the camera mode by two steps. Besides, the MEDIA_DOWNLOAD is decoupled from the CameraMode. Determine what the last camera mode was by checking getMode before entering the playback.
      确定当前相机是否支持平面相机模式。如果CameraMode和ShootPhotoMode变为FlatCameraMode，则返回true。FlatCameraMode和setFlatMode可用于直接设置相机模式。用户无需使用setMode和setShootPhotoMode两步设置相机模式。此外，MEDIA_DOWNLOAD与CameraMode分离。在进入播放之前，通过检查getMode来确定最后的相机模式。

      Return:
      boolean A boolean value.
      布尔值。
      Set Flat Mode
      method
      setFlatMode
      method setFlatMode
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the camera's flat mode to take photo, record video, or enter intelligent camera modes. Please note that you cannot change the mode when a certain task is executing. This is available only when isFlatCameraModeSupported returns true.
      将相机的平面模式设置为拍照、录制视频或进入智能相机模式。请注意，在执行特定任务时，无法更改模式。这仅在isFlatCameraModeSupported返回true时可用。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull FlatCameraMode mode Camera flat mode. See FlatCameraMode to find details.
      相机平面模式。有关详细信息，请参见FlatCameraMode。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      Get Flat Mode

      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.MODE
      Description:

      Sets the camera's work mode to taking pictures, video, playback or download. Please note that you cannot change the mode when a certain task is executing, such as taking photo(s), recording video, or downloading and saving files. Also supported by thermal imaging camera.
      将相机的工作模式设置为拍照、视频、播放或下载。请注意，当执行某项任务时，如拍照、录制视频或下载并保存文件时，您无法更改模式。还支持热成像相机。

      Shoot Photo
      method
      startShootPhoto
      method startShootPhoto
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.START_SHOOT_PHOTO
      Description:

      Camera starts to take photo with one of the camera capture modes (shoot photo modes).Also,

      Precondition:
      1. Camera must be in ShootPhoto mode. Check the enum named CameraShootPhotoMode in DJICameraSettingsDef to find all possible camera capture modes. For thermal imaging camera, Single photo can be taken while recording video.
      2. The SD card state should be checked before this method is used to ensure sufficient space exists.

      Post condition:
      If the capture mode is either Burst or Interval, calling stopShootPhoto will be required for the camera to stop taking photos.

      相机开始使用其中一种相机拍摄模式（拍摄照片模式）拍摄照片。此外，前提条件：1。相机必须处于ShootPhoto模式。检查DJICameraSettingsDef中名为CameraShootPhotoMode的枚举以查找所有可能的相机捕获模式。对于热成像相机，可以在录制视频时拍摄单个照片。2.在使用此方法之前，应检查SD卡状态，以确保存在足够的空间。后置条件：如果拍摄模式为“突发”或“间隔”，则需要调用stopShootPhoto，相机才能停止拍摄照片。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      method
      stopShootPhoto
      method stopShootPhoto
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.STOP_SHOOT_PHOTO
      Description:

      Camera stops taking photos.

      Precondition:
      1. startShootPhoto has been invoked and the shoot mode is either Interval or Time-lapse.
      2. If the capture mode is set to Single, the camera will automatically stop taking the photo once the individual photo is taken.

      相机停止拍照。前提条件：1。startShootPhoto已被调用，拍摄模式为“间隔”或“延时”。2.如果拍摄模式设置为“单一”，则在拍摄单个照片后，相机将自动停止拍摄照片。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。

      Capabilities

      SettingsDefinitions
      enum
      FlatCameraMode
      enum FlatCameraMode
      Package: dji.common.camera
      Description:

      Flat camera mode can be used to set the mode to camera directly. The benefit is no need to set the camera mode to shoot photo mode or the Record video first. Please use setFlatMode to set the flat mode. This is available only when isFlatCameraModeSupported returns true.
      平面相机模式可用于直接将模式设置为相机。好处是无需先将相机模式设置为拍摄照片模式或录制视频。请使用setFlatMode设置平面模式。这仅在isFlatCameraModeSupported返回true时可用。

      Enum Members:
      SLOW_MOTION Sets the camera to slow motion video recording mode. Only supported by Mavic Air 2, DJI Air 2S.
      将相机设置为慢动作视频录制模式。仅由Mavic Air 2、DJI Air 2S支持。
      VIDEO_NORMAL Sets the camera to record normal videos.
      设置相机以录制普通视频。
      PHOTO_TIME_LAPSE Sets the camera to take a picture (or multiple pictures) continuously at a set time interval. The camera will merge the photo sequence and the output is a video. The minimum interval for Video only format is 1 s. The minimum interval for Video+Photo format is 2 s.
      将相机设置为以设置的时间间隔连续拍摄一张照片（或多张照片）。相机将合并照片序列，输出为视频。仅视频格式的最小间隔为1秒。视频+照片格式的最小时间间隔为2秒。
      PHOTO_AEB Automatic Exposure Bracketing (AEB) capture. In this mode you can quickly take multiple shots (the default is 3) at different exposures without having to manually change any settings between frames.
      自动曝光支架（AEB）捕获。在此模式下，您可以在不同的曝光下快速拍摄多张照片（默认值为3张），而无需手动更改帧之间的任何设置。
      PHOTO_SINGLE Sets the camera to take a single photo.
      设置相机以拍摄单个照片。
      PHOTO_BURST Set the camera to take multiple photos at once.
      将相机设置为一次拍摄多张照片。
      PHOTO_HDR Sets the camera to take photos in HDR mode.
      设置相机以HDR模式拍摄照片。
      VIDEO_HDR Sets the camera to HDR video recording mode. Only supported by Mavic Air 2.
      将相机设置为HDR视频录制模式。仅由Mavic Air 2提供支持。
      PHOTO_INTERVAL Sets the camera to take a picture (or multiple pictures) continuously at a set time interval. The minimum interval for JPEG format of any quality is 2s.
      将相机设置为以设置的时间间隔连续拍摄一张照片（或多张照片）。任何质量的JPEG格式的最小间隔为2s。
      PHOTO_HYPER_LIGHT Sets the camera to take photos in HyperLight mode. It is a setting for low-light environment to enhance the photo quality while reducing noise significantly.
      将相机设置为在HyperLight模式下拍摄照片。这是针对低光环境的设置，以提高照片质量，同时显著降低噪声。
      PHOTO_PANORAMA Sets the camera to take photos in panorama mode. the aircraft takes a series of photos with different gimbal and aircraft heading positions. The photos can be stitched with a third-party library.
      设置相机以全景模式拍摄照片。飞机拍摄了一系列不同万向节和飞机航向位置的照片。可以使用第三方库缝合照片。
      PHOTO_EHDR Sets the camera to take an enhanced-HDR photo. It blends a sequence of photos for ghost-free high dynamic range photos.
      设置相机以拍摄增强的HDR照片。它混合了一系列照片，以获得无重影的高动态范围照片。
      PHOTO_HIGH_RESOLUTION Sets the camera to the high resolution mode. In this mode, the camera will take photos with a resolution of 48MP. Only supported by Mavic Air 2.
      将相机设置为高分辨率模式。在此模式下，相机将以48MP的分辨率拍摄照片。仅由Mavic Air 2提供支持。
      PHOTO_SUPER_RESOLUTION Sets the camera to the super resolution mode. In this mode, drag to select an area in the wide camera view, the gimbal will move automatically and take a series of 20MP photos of the selected area at the current zoom ratio by the zoom camera. All photos will be saved in the same sub-folder in the microSD card, and an HTML file will be created. To view the wide and close-up images, open the HTML file using a browser on a PC. If you want to view the close-up images in app, please refer to the sample implementation. Using setSuperResolutionCaptureArea to set the super resolution capture area. Using setSuperResolutionInfoCallback to listen the super resolution state. Only supported by Matrice 300 RTK.
      将相机设置为超分辨率模式。在此模式下，拖动以在宽相机视图中选择一个区域，万向节将自动移动，并通过缩放相机以当前缩放比例拍摄所选区域的一系列20MP照片。所有照片将保存在microSD卡的同一子文件夹中，并创建一个HTML文件。要查看宽图像和特写图像，请使用PC上的浏览器打开HTML文件。如果您想在应用程序中查看特写图像，则请参考示例实现。使用setSuperResolutionCaptureArea设置超分辨率捕获区域。使用setSuperResolutionInfoCallback侦听超分辨率状态。仅Matrice 300 RTK支持。
      PHOTO_SMART Sets the camera to the smart mode. In this mode, when shooting photo, the camera can automatically recognize the scene, and use the built-in algorithm to optimize the scene. Only supported by Mavic Air 2, DJI Air 2S.
      将相机设置为智能模式。在这种模式下，当拍摄照片时，相机可以自动识别场景，并使用内置算法优化场景。仅由Mavic Air 2、DJI Air 2S支持。
      INTERNAL_AI_SPOT_CHECKING Internal work mode during smart inspection and it cannot be set manually. This mode might last for less than 10 seconds, during when the user cannot take photo, record a video, enter media playback mode, set spot metering target of ZOOM lens type, and set zoom focus length with any lens type. Only AUTO can be set with ZOOM lens type. In this mode, remote controller also cannot be used to take photo, record video and adjust focus. It's only supported by Matrice 300 RTK.
      智能检查期间的内部工作模式，无法手动设置。当用户无法拍照、录制视频、进入媒体播放模式、设置ZOOM镜头类型的点测光目标以及设置任何镜头类型的变焦焦距时，此模式可能持续不到10秒。ZOOM镜头类型只能设置AUTO（自动）。在此模式下，遥控器也不能用于拍照、录制视频和调整焦距。它仅由Matrice 300 RTK支持。
      UNKNOWN The camera work mode is unknown.
      相机工作模式未知。

      PhotoPanoramaMode
      enum PhotoPanoramaMode
      Package: dji.common.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.PHOTO_PANORAMA_MODE
      Description:

      Panorama photo modes.
      全景照片模式。

      Enum Members:
      PANORAMA_MODE_3X3 Camera will shoot 3 rows of 3 photos. Each photo in a row will be taken with a different aircraft heading. Each row of photos is taken with a different gimbal pitch.
      相机将拍摄3行3张照片。一行中的每一张照片都将以不同的飞机航向拍摄。每一排照片都是用不同的万向节间距拍摄的。

      PANORAMA_MODE_180 Camera will shoot 3 photos with the same gimbal pitch (facing forward) and different aircraft headings.
      相机将以相同的万向节间距（朝前）和不同的飞机航向拍摄3张照片。
      PANORAMA_MODE_SUPER_RESOLUTION The camera will capture and patch nine photos resulting in a 48-megapixel super resolution photo. It is supported by Spark, Mavic Air, Mavic 2, Mavic 2 Pro, Mavic 2 Zoom, Mavic 2 Eneterprise, Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual.
      该相机将拍摄并修补9张照片，从而生成4800万像素的超分辨率照片。它由Spark、Mavic Air、Mavic2、Mavic3 Pro、Mavic4 Zoom、Mavic5 Enterprise和Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual提供支持。

      Exposure & White Balance

      Exposure Mode
      method
      setExposureMode
      method setExposureMode
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.EXPOSURE_MODE
      Description:

      Sets the camera's exposure mode. Check ExposureMode to view all possible camera exposure modes. Please note that in different exposure mode, it will have different values for the same setting. For Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual, the exposure mode is always PROGRAM. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      设置相机的曝光模式。选中曝光模式以查看所有可能的相机曝光模式。请注意，在不同的曝光模式下，对于相同的设置，它将具有不同的值。对于Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual，曝光模式始终为PROGRAM。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull ExposureMode mode Camera exposure mode to set.
      要设置的相机曝光模式。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      method
      getExposureMode
      method getExposureMode
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.EXPOSURE_MODE

      获取相机的曝光模式。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      返回值的执行回调。
      ISO
      method
      setISO
      method setISO
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.ISO
      Description:

      Sets the camera's ISO value. See ISO to view all possible ISO settings for the camera. For the X5, X5R, Phantom 4 Pro camera, X4S and X5S, the ISO value can be set for all modes. For the other cameras, the ISO value can only be set when the camera exposure mode is in Manual mode. See the setExposureMode method for how to set exposure mode. For Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual, the ISO value is always AUTO. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      设置摄影机的ISO值。请参见ISO以查看相机的所有可能的ISO设置。对于X5、X5R、Phantom 4 Pro相机、X4S和X5S，可以为所有模式设置ISO值。对于其他相机，ISO值只能在相机曝光模式处于手动模式时设置。有关如何设置曝光模式，请参见setExposureMode方法。对于Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual，ISO值始终为AUTO。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull ISO iso The ISO value to set the camera to use. Please check the enum CameraISOe in DJICameraSettingsDef to find all possible ISO values that the camera can be set to.
      要设置相机使用的ISO值。请检查DJICameraSettingsDef中的枚举CameraISOe，以查找相机可以设置为的所有可能的ISO值。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。

      Shutter Speed
      method
      setShutterSpeed
      method setShutterSpeed
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.SHUTTER_SPEED
      Description:

      Sets the camera shutter speed. To see all available shutterSpeed value settings, see ShutterSpeed. The shutter speed should not be set slower than the video frame rate when the camera's mode is RECORD_VIDEO. For example, if the video frame rate is 30fps, the shutterSpeed must be <= 1/30. Precondition: The shutter speed can be set only when the camera exposure mode is Shutter mode or Manual mode. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      设置相机快门速度。要查看所有可用的shutterSpeed值设置，请参见shutterSpeed。当相机模式为RECORD_video时，快门速度不应设置为低于视频帧速率。例如，如果视频帧速率为30fps，shutterSpeed必须<=1/30。前提条件：只有当相机曝光模式为快门模式或手动模式时，才能设置快门速度。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull ShutterSpeed shutterSpeed The ISO value to set the camera to use. Please check the enum CameraISOe in DJICameraSettingsDef to find all possible ISO values that the camera can be set to.
      要设置相机使用的ISO值。请检查DJICameraSettingsDef中的枚举CameraISOe，以查找相机可以设置为的所有可能的ISO值。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      method

      method
      setSpotMeteringTarget
      method setSpotMeteringTarget
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.SPOT_METERING_TARGET
      Description:

      Sets the spot metering area index. The camera image is divided into 96 spots defined by 12 columns and 8 rows. The row index range is [0,7], where the values increase top to bottom across the image. The column index range is [0, 11], where the values increase left to right. In order to make the method work, The camera exposure mode should be Program, Shutter or Aperture, the exposure metering mode must be SPOT, and setAELock must be false. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      设置点测光区域索引。相机图像被划分为由12列和8行限定的96个点。行索引范围为[0,7]，其中值在整个图像上从上到下递增。列索引范围为[0，11]，其中值从左到右递增。为了使该方法有效，相机曝光模式应为Program（程序）、Shutter（快门）或Aperture（光圈），曝光测光模式必须为SPOT，setAELock必须为false。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull Point spotIndex Spot metering point coordinate (x, y). x is column index to be set. The value should falls in [0, 11], where the values increase left to right. y is row index to be set. The value should falls in [0, 7], where the values increase top to bottom across the image.
      点测光点坐标（x，y）。x是要设置的列索引。该值应落在[0，11]中，其中值从左到右增加。y是要设置的行索引。该值应落在[0，7]中，其中值在整个图像中从上到下递增。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      method
      getSpotMeteringTarget
      method getSpotMeteringTarget
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.SPOT_METERING_TARGET
      Description:

      Gets the spot metering area row index and column index. In order to make the method work, The camera exposure mode should be PROGRAM, SHUTTER_PRIORITY or APERTURE_PRIORITY, the exposure metering mode must be SPOT, and getAELock must be false. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      获取点计数区域行索引和列索引。为了使该方法有效，相机曝光模式应为PROGRAM、SHUTTER_PRIORITY或APERTURE_PRIORITY，曝光计量模式必须为SPOT，getAELock必须为false。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull final CompletionCallbackWith<Point> callback The execution callback with the returned value(s).
      返回值的执行回调。

      Auto Exposure (AE)
      method
      setAELock
      method setAELock
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.AE_LOCK
      Description:

      Locks or unlocks the camera's AE (auto exposure).
      Post condition:
      If the AE lock is enabled, the spot metering area cannot be set. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      锁定或解锁相机的AE（自动曝光）。后置条件：如果启用AE锁定，则无法设置点测光区域。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      boolean isLocked true if the camera AE is locked, false if it is unlocked.
      如果相机AE被锁定，则为true；如果相机AE未锁定，则是false。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.

      Package: dji.sdk.camera

      Description:

      TapZoom uses a multiplier to change the zoom scale when called. The final zoom scale for a TapZoom will be: Current Zoom Scale x Multiplier. The multiplier range is [1,5]. A multiplier of 1 will not change the zoom. When the multiplier is 1, the zoom scale will not change during TapZoom. It is only supported by Z30 camera. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      TapZoom使用乘数在调用时更改缩放比例。TapZoom的最终缩放比例为：当前缩放比例x乘数。乘数范围为[1,5]。乘数1不会改变缩放。当乘数为1时，TapZoom期间缩放比例不会改变。它仅受Z30相机支持。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      setFocusAssistantSettings
      method setFocusAssistantSettings
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.FOCUS_ASSISTANT_SETTINGS
      Description:

      Used to enable/disable the lens focus assistant. When the focus assistant is enabled, the camera live view will digitally zoom into the focus target area so the user can see the quality of focus. Focus assistant can be used for both manual focus (MF) and auto focus (AF). It is available only when isAdjustableFocalPointSupported returns true. Supported only by the X5, X5R, Z3, Phantom 4 Pro camera, X4S and X5S. Because Z3 only supports AF mode, isEnabledMF will be ignored.
      用于启用/禁用镜头对焦助手。启用对焦助手后，相机实时视图将以数字方式缩放到对焦目标区域，以便用户可以看到对焦质量。对焦助手可用于手动对焦（MF）和自动对焦（AF）。它仅在isAdjustableFocalPointSupported返回true时可用。仅X5、X5R、Z3、Phantom 4 Pro摄像头、X4S和X5S支持。因为Z3只支持AF模式，所以isEnabledMF将被忽略。

      Input Parameters:
      FocusAssistantSettings settings Sets whether the lens focus assistant for AF and MF mode is enabled.
      设置是否启用AF和MF模式的镜头对焦助手。

      method
      setFocusRingValue
      method setFocusRingValue
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.FOCUS_RING_VALUE
      Description:

      Set the focal distance by simulating the focus ring adjustment. Value can have a range of 0, getFocusRingValueUpperBound], which represents infinity and the closest possible focal distance. It is available only when isAdjustableFocalPointSupported returns true. For some lenses, the minimum focus ring value is larger than 0. For example the minimum of DJI MFT 15mm f/1.7 ASPH is 270. To retrieve the minimum value, perform the following steps: - Call setFocusMode with AUTO. - Call setFocusTarget with the furthest target (>30m). - Call getFocusRingValue to get the current focus ring value. This is the minimum value. The maximum value can be retrieved using getFocusRingValueUpperBound. Supported only by X5, X5R, Z3 cameras, Phantom 4 Pro, X4S, X5S, Mavic 2 Pro, Mavic 2 Zoom Camera and Mavic 2 Enterprise Camera. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      通过模拟调焦环调整来设置焦距。值的范围可以为0，getFocusRingValueUpperBound]，它表示无限远和最接近的焦距。它仅在isAdjustableFocalPointSupported返回true时可用。对于某些镜头，最小聚焦环值大于0。例如，DJI MFT 15mm f/1.7 ASPH的最小值为270。要检索最小值，请执行以下步骤：-使用AUTO调用setFocusMode。-用最远的目标（>30m）调用setFocusTarget。-调用getFocusRingValue以获取当前的焦点环值。这是最小值。可以使用getFocusRingValueUpperBound检索最大值。仅支持X5、X5R、Z3摄像头、Phantom 4 Pro、X4S、X5S、Mavic 2 Pro、Mavic2 Zoom Camera和Mavic2 Enterprise Camera。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @IntRange(from = 0) int value Value to adjust focus ring to. The minimum value is 0, the maximum value depends on the installed lens. Please use method getFocusRingValueUpperBound to ensure the input argument is valid.
      将聚焦环调整到的值。最小值为0，最大值取决于安装的镜头。请使用getFocusRingValueUpperBound方法确保输入参数有效。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      method

      SSD RAW Resolution and Frame Rate
      method
      setSSDVideoResolutionAndFrameRate
      method setSSDVideoResolutionAndFrameRate
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.SSD_VIDEO_RESOLUTION_AND_FRAME_RATE
      Description:

      Set Raw Video Resolution and Frame Rate of the SSD. Note, only raw video is saved to the SSD. Compressed video, compressed pictures and raw pictures are all saved to the SD Card. During video capture, Raw video and compressed video are saved simultaneously to the SSD and SD Card respectively. @warning The supported resolutions and frame rates for SSD Raw Videos are shown below:

      NTSC:
      Resolution_4096x2160, FrameRate_24fps
      Resolution_3840x2160, FrameRate_24fps
      Resolution_3840x2160, FrameRate_30fps
      Resolution_2704X1520, FrameRate_24fps
      Resolution_2704X1520, FrameRate_30fps
      Resolution_1920x1080, FrameRate_60fps
      Resolution_1920x1080, FrameRate_48fps
      Resolution_1920x1080, FrameRate_30fps
      Resolution_1920x1080, FrameRate_24fps



      PAL:
      Resolution_4096x2160, FrameRate_25fps
      Resolution_4096x2160, FrameRate_24fps
      Resolution_3840x2160, FrameRate_25fps
      Resolution_3840x2160, FrameRate_24fps
      Resolution_2704X1520, FrameRate_25fps
      Resolution_2704X1520, FrameRate_24fps
      Resolution_1920x1080, FrameRate_50fps
      Resolution_1920x1080, FrameRate_48fps
      Resolution_1920x1080, FrameRate_25fps
      Resolution_1920x1080, FrameRate_24fps

      For X5S, the frame rate of SSD has to be the same as the video to be stored in SD card, so frameRate is ignored. The possible resolutions are determined by SD card video's frame rate and the SSD video license (CameraSSDVideoLicense) being used. The supported resolutions in the current configuration can be queried by using SSDVideoResolutionRange in Capabilities.
      设置SSD的原始视频分辨率和帧速率。注意，只有原始视频保存到SSD。压缩视频、压缩图片和原始图片都保存到SD卡中。在视频捕获期间，原始视频和压缩视频分别同时保存到SSD和SD卡@警告SSD原始视频支持的分辨率和帧速率如下所示：NTSC:Resolution_4096x2160、FrameRate_24fps Resolution_2840x2160、FrameRate_34fps分辨率_3840x2160，FrameRate_30fps分辨率_2704X1520，FrameRate_26fps分辨率_704X1520，FrameRate_30fps分辨率_1920x1080，FrameRate_24fps PAL:分辨率_4096x2160，FrameRate_35fps分辨率_4092x2160，FrameRate_24fps分辨率_3840x2160，FrameRate_55fps清晰度_3840x260，FrameRate_44fps分辨率_2704X1520，FrameRate_125fps分辨率_2 704X1520、FrameRate_224fps分辨率_1 920x1080、FrameRate_50fps清晰度_1920x1060，FrameRate_25fps分辨率_1920x1080，FrameRate_24fps对于X5S，SSD的帧速率必须与存储在SD卡中的视频相同，因此帧速率被忽略。可能的分辨率取决于SD卡视频的帧速率和所使用的SSD视频许可证（CameraSSDVideoLicense）。可以使用功能中的SSDVideoResolutionRange查询当前配置中支持的分辨率。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull ResolutionAndFrameRate resolutionAndFrameRate Resolution and frame rate to be set for the video.
      要为视频设置的分辨率和帧速率。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。

      Storage Settings

      Custom Expand Directory Name
      method
      setCustomExpandDirectoryName
      method setCustomExpandDirectoryName
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Custom expand directory name settings. After calling this interface, the newly generated media files (videos or photos) will be stored in the new folder, this new folder's name will be appended by your custom directory name. For example, the default folder name is "DJI_202001012359_01", you could append "Mission1" after it, so the new folder's name will be "DJI_202001012359_01_Mission1". In one flight, you can set multiple expand directory names to create multiple custom folders. Only Supported by Zenmuse P1, Zenmuse L1, Zenmuse H20 and Zenmuse H20T.
      自定义展开目录名设置。调用此界面后，新生成的媒体文件（视频或照片）将存储在新文件夹中，此新文件夹的名称将附加您的自定义目录名。例如，默认文件夹名称为“DJI_2001012359_01”，您可以在其后面附加“Mission1”，因此新文件夹的名称将为“DJI_200101235901_Mission1”。在一次飞行中，您可以设置多个扩展目录名称以创建多个自定义文件夹。仅支持Zenmuse P1、Zenmuse L1、Zenmus H20和Zenmuse H20T。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull String name Custom directory name to set.
      要设置的自定义目录名。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The completion callback that receives the execution result.
      接收执行结果的完成回调。

      Custom Expand File Name
      method
      setCustomExpandFileName
      method setCustomExpandFileName
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Custom expand file name settings. By calling this interface, the name of next media file (video or photo) which would be stored in camera will be appended by the custom file name you set. For example, the default photo name is "DJI_2020012091415_999_WIDE.JPG", you could append "Waypoint1" after the default photo name, so the new photo's name will be "DJI_2020012091415_999_WIDE_Waypoint1.JPG", This action will only take effect once. If you want to have the same name for all media files in one flight, you need to set this action before taking each photo. Only Supported by Zenmmuse P1, Zenmuse H20 and Zenmuse H20T.
      自定义扩展文件名设置。通过调用此界面，将存储在相机中的下一个媒体文件（视频或照片）的名称将附加您设置的自定义文件名。例如，默认照片名称为“DJI_20012091415_999_WIDE.JPG”，您可以在默认照片名称后添加“Waypoint1”，因此新照片的名称将为“DJI_2001209141_5999_WIDE_Waypoint1.JPG”。此操作只会生效一次。如果您希望在一次飞行中所有媒体文件具有相同的名称，则需要在拍摄每张照片之前设置此操作。仅支持Zenmmuse P1、Zenmuse H20和Zenmuse H20T。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull String name Custom file name to set.
      要设置的自定义文件名。

      接收执行结果的完成回调。

      Vision Stabilization
      method
      setVisionStabilizationEnabled
      method setVisionStabilizationEnabled
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.VISION_STABILIZATION_ENABLED
      Description:

      Enables vision stabilization for Z30 camera on M200 series. The vision system in the M200 series of aircraft can be used to compensate for any drift in the gimbal by analyzing the live view when there is no gimbal movement. Drift in the gimbal will be most noticeable at higher zoom factors. It is only supported Z30 on M200 series.
      启用M200系列Z30相机的视觉稳定。M200系列飞机中的视觉系统可用于在没有万向节运动时通过分析实时视图来补偿万向节中的任何漂移。在较高的变焦系数下，万向节中的漂移最为明显。M200系列仅支持Z30。

      Input Parameters:
      final boolean enable true to enable the vision stabilization.
      以实现视力稳定。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback completion callback to receive the result.
      完成回调以接收结果。

      Media File Custom Info
      method
      setMediaFileCustomInformation
      method setMediaFileCustomInformation
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.CUSTOM_INFORMATION
      Description:

      Custom information can be stored in media file's XMP meta data. The custom information is written to the media file automatically after the media file is created. This method defines the information to write. The same information will be written to all media files until the information is changed again by this method. Custom information written to each file can be retrieved through fetchCustomInformation or from the image itself when processed on a separate system. It is supported by Phantom 4 Pro, Phantom 4 Advanced, Phantom 4 Pro V2.0, Zenmuse P1, Zenmuse L1, Zenmuse X4S, Zenmuse X5S, Zenmuse X7, Mavic 2 Enterprise camera and Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual camera.
      自定义信息可以存储在媒体文件的XMP元数据中。创建媒体文件后，自定义信息将自动写入媒体文件。此方法定义要写入的信息。相同的信息将写入所有媒体文件，直到通过此方法再次更改信息。当在单独的系统上处理时，可以通过fetchCustomInformation或从图像本身检索写入每个文件的自定义信息。它由Phantom 4 Pro、Phantom 2 Advanced、Phanto 4 Pro V2.0、Zenmuse P1、Zenmusse L1、Zenmuses X4S、Zenmus X5S、Zenmuse X7、Mavic 2 Enterprise相机和Mavic 3 Enterprise双摄像头支持。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull String information Custom information to set. Use UTF-8 encoding with a length equal to or less than 31 characters.
      要设置的自定义信息。使用长度等于或小于31个字符的UTF-8编码。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback to receive the result.
      接收结果的执行回调。

      Sensor Cleaning Mode
      method
      initSensorCleaningMode
      method initSensorCleaningMode
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Initiates the sensor cleaning mode. Calling this will change getSensorCleaningState from IDLE to INITIATING. To start the sensor dedusting operation, the workflow should be:
      1. Call initSensorCleaningMode.
      2. Remove the lens from the camera.
      3. Call startSensorCleaning.
      4. When getSensorCleaningState becomes WAITING_FOR_LENS_REMOUNT, mount the lens back to the camera.

      It is only supported Zenmuse X7.
      启动传感器清洁模式。调用此命令将使getSensorCleaningState从IDLE更改为INITIATING。要启动传感器除尘操作，工作流程应为：1。调用initSensorCleaningMode。2.从相机上取下镜头。3.调用startSensorCleaning。4.当getSensorCleaningState变为WAITING_FOR_LENS_REMOUNT时，将镜头装回相机。仅支持Zenmuse X7。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      method
      startSensorCleaning
      method startSensorCleaning
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Starts cleaning the sensor. The sensor cleaning should only be started when the lens is removed from the camera. It is only supported Zenmuse X7.
      开始清洁传感器。只有当镜头从相机上取下时，才能开始传感器清洁。仅支持Zenmuse X7。

      Input Parameters:
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      method
      exitSensorCleaningMode
      method exitSensorCleaningMode
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Exits sensor cleaning mode. Calling this will stop the current executing operation and change getSensorCleaningState to IDLE.
      退出传感器清洁模式。调用此命令将停止当前正在执行的操作，并将getSensorCleaningState更改为IDLE。

      EI Mode
      method
      isEIModeSupported
      method isEIModeSupported
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Determines whether the EI (exposure index) mode is supported by the camera. In this mode, the camera mimics the way a film camera works to help cinematographers capture as much information as possible while balancing the dynamic range and noise with different log curves. This mode only takes effect when the camera mode is in RECORD_VIDEO. The EI mode is supported by X4S, X5S and X7. In multiple lenses camera, if one of its lenses supports this feature, the camera and the lens that can supports both return true. User can only access the parameters through the lens object.
      确定相机是否支持EI（曝光指数）模式。在这种模式下，摄影机模仿电影摄影机的工作方式，帮助摄影师捕捉尽可能多的信息，同时用不同的对数曲线平衡动态范围和噪声。此模式仅在相机模式处于RECORD_VIDEO时生效。X4S、X5S和X7支持EI模式。在多镜头相机中，如果其中一个镜头支持此功能，则相机和可以同时支持这两个功能的镜头将返回为真。用户只能通过镜头对象访问参数。

      Return:
      boolean true if the EI mode is supported, otherwise false.
      如果支持EI模式，则为true，否则为false。
      method

      Digital Data Enhancement (DDE)
      method
      setThermalDDE
      method setThermalDDE
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.THERMAL_DDE
      Description:

      Sets the Digital Data Enhancement index (for DDE dynamic mode). DDE can be used to enhance image details (sharpen, higher index) and/or suppress fixed pattern noise (soften, lower index). It can be set manually only when the Scene mode is Manual, User1, User2 or User3. Supported only by thermal imaging cameras, except Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual thermal camera. For Zenmuse H20T, please use class Lens.
      设置数字数据增强索引（DDE动态模式）。DDE可用于增强图像细节（锐化、较高索引）和/或抑制固定模式噪声（软化、较低索引）。仅当场景模式为手动、用户1、用户2或用户3时，才能手动设置。仅支持热成像相机，Mavic 2 Enterprise双热相机除外。对于Zenmuse H20T，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @IntRange(from = -20, to = 100) int value Integer in range [-20, 100]. Values less than 0 soften the image and filter fixed pattern noise. Values greater than 0 sharpen the details in the image. Value of 0 results in no enhancement.
      范围为[-20，100]的整数。小于0的值会软化图像并过滤固定模式噪声。大于0的值会锐化图像中的细节。值为0不会导致增强。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。

      Active Contrast Enhancement (ACE)
      method
      setThermalACE
      method setThermalACE
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.THERMAL_ACE
      Description:

      Set the value of Active Contrast Enhancement. Active contrast enhancement allows for a contrast trade-off between hotter and colder scenes when using 8-bit pixel data. It can be set manually only when the Scene mode is User1, User2 or User3. Supported only by thermal imaging cameras, except Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual thermal camera. For Zenmuse H20T, please use class Lens.
      设置“活动对比度增强”的值。当使用8位像素数据时，主动对比度增强允许在更热和更冷的场景之间进行对比度权衡。仅当场景模式为User1、User2或User3时，才能手动设置。仅支持热成像相机，Mavic 2 Enterprise双热相机除外。对于Zenmuse H20T，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @IntRange(from = -8, to = 8) int value Integer in range [-8, 8]. <br> value > 0: more contrast in hotter scene content and less contrast in colder scene content (sky, ocean etc.). <br> value < 0: more contrast in colder scene content and less contrast in hotter scene content. <br> value = 0: neutral <br> value = 3: recommended for generic use
      范围[-8，8]内的整数
      值>0：在较热的场景内容中对比度较高，而在较冷的场景内容（天空、海洋等）中对比度较低。
      值<0：在较冷场景内容中的对比度较高而在较热场景内容中则对比度较小
      值=0：中性
      值=3：建议用于一般用途
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。

      Smart Scene Optimization (SSO)
      method
      setThermalSSO
      method setThermalSSO
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.THERMAL_SSO
      Description:

      Sets the value of Smart Scene Optimization. When using non-linear histogram equalization to map the 14-bit sensor pixel values to 8-bit pixel values, it can become difficult to determine the difference in temperature of two objects from their different shades of gray. SSO allows a percentage of the 14-bit histogram to be mapped linearly to the 8-bit histogram, which will compromise local contrast, but allow for more accurate visual radiometric measurements. This is particularly useful for bi-modal scenes. It can be set manually only when the Scene mode is User1, User2 or User3. Supported only by thermal imaging cameras, except Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual thermal camera. For Zenmuse H20T, please use class Lens.
      设置“智能场景优化”的值。当使用非线性直方图均衡来将14位传感器像素值映射到8位像素值时，很难根据两个对象的不同灰度来确定其温度差异。SSO允许将14位直方图的一部分线性映射到8位直方图，这将损害局部对比度，但允许更精确的视觉辐射测量。这对于双模态场景特别有用。仅当场景模式为User1、User2或User3时，才能手动设置。仅支持热成像相机，Mavic 2 Enterprise双热相机除外。对于Zenmuse H20T，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @IntRange(from = 0, to = 100) int value Percentage of histogram to map linearly [0, 100].
      要线性映射的直方图百分比[0，100]。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      method
      getThermalSSO
      method getThermalSSO
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.THERMAL_SSO
      Description:

      Gets the value of Smart Scene Optimization. The value is available only when the Scene mode is Manual, User1, User2 or User3. Supported only by thermal imaging cameras, except Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual thermal camera. For Zenmuse H20T, please use class Lens.
      获取“智能场景优化”的值。仅当场景模式为手动、用户1、用户2或用户3时，该值才可用。仅支持热成像相机，Mavic 2 Enterprise双热相机除外。对于Zenmuse H20T，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull final CompletionCallbackWith<Integer> callback The execution callback with the returned value(s).
      返回值的执行回调。

      Isotherms
      method
      setThermalIsothermEnabled
      method setThermalIsothermEnabled
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.THERMAL_ISOTHERM_ENABLED
      Description:

      Enable or disable Isotherms. Isotherms can be used to highlight specific temperature ranges: When disabled, all 256 values (8-bits) are dedicated to the temperature histogram of the scene. When enabled, only 128 values (0-127) are mapped linearly to temperature. Then three bands 128-175, 176-223 and 224-255 can be mapped to the user defined temperatures to highlight them to the user. Using some of the false color palettes (like RainbowIso) results in a thermal image that is grey scale except for three specific bands highlighted by either reds, blues or greens. Supported only by thermal imaging cameras. For Zenmuse H20T, please use class Lens.
      启用或禁用等温线。等温线可用于突出显示特定的温度范围：禁用时，所有256个值（8位）都专用于场景的温度直方图。启用时，只有128个值（0-127）线性映射到温度。然后，可以将三个带128-175、176-223和224-255映射到用户定义的温度，以向用户突出显示它们。使用一些假调色板（如RainbowIso）会产生灰度级的热图像，但红色、蓝色或绿色突出显示的三个特定波段除外。仅由热成像相机支持。对于Zenmuse H20T，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      boolean enabled true if isotherms are enabled.
      如果启用等温线，则为true。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      method

      method getThermalIsothermEnabled

      确定是否启用等温线。如果启用等温线，则为true。仅由热成像相机支持。对于Zenmuse H20T，请使用类镜头。

      setThermalIsothermUpperValue
      method setThermalIsothermUpperValue
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.THERMAL_ISOTHERM_UPPER_VALUE
      Description:

      Sets the upper threshold value for Isotherm. All temperature values above this will use colors 224-255 from the palette. Supported only by thermal imaging cameras. For Zenmuse H20T, please use class Lens.
      设置等温线的上限阈值。高于此值的所有温度值将使用调色板中的颜色224-255。仅由热成像相机支持。对于Zenmuse H20T，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @IntRange(from = 0, to = 100) int value If the unit is percentage, the allowed range is [0,100]. If the unit is Celsius, for Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual thermal camera, the value range is [-10, 400]. For other thermal imaging cameras, the value range is [-40, 500]. The value can only be equal or larger than middle Isotherm threshold.
      如果单位为百分比，则允许范围为[0100]。如果单位为摄氏度，对于Mavic 2 Enterprise双热相机，值范围为[-10400]。对于其他热成像相机，值范围为[-40500]。该值只能等于或大于中间等温线阈值。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。

      Gain
      method
      setThermalGainMode
      method setThermalGainMode
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      SDK Key: CameraKey.THERMAL_GAIN_MODE
      Description:

      Sets the gain mode. Low gain mode can be used for scenes with temperatures ranging from -40 to 550 degrees Celsius. For higher contrast, the high gain mode can be used by for temperatures between -25 to 135 degrees Celsius for the 640x512 camera and -25 to 100 degrees Celsius for 324 x 256 camera. Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual has different temperature range from other thermal imaging cameras. Therefore, for Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual, the low gain mode can be used from -10 to 140 degrees Celsius. The high gain mode can be used from -10 to 400 degree Celsius. Supported by thermal imaging cameras. For Zenmuse H20T, please use class Lens.
      设置增益模式。低增益模式可用于温度范围为-40至550摄氏度的场景。为了获得更高的对比度，640x512相机的温度范围为-25至135摄氏度，324 x 256相机的温度为-25至100摄氏度时，可以使用高增益模式。Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual具有与其他热成像相机不同的温度范围。因此，对于Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual，低增益模式可以在-10至140摄氏度范围内使用。高增益模式可在-10至400摄氏度范围内使用。由热成像摄像机支持。对于Zenmuse H20T，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull ThermalGainMode mode An enum type of the ThermalGainMode to be used.
      要使用的ThermalGainMode的枚举类型。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。

      MSX Level
      method
      setMSXLevel
      method setMSXLevel
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the level for MSX display mode. The range for level is [0, 100]. When it is 0, the visible spectrum definition is invisible. When it is 100, the visual spectrum definition is the most obvious. Only supported by XT2 camera and Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual. Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual does not support with firmware version lower than 01.01.0520. For Zenmuse H20, Zenmuse H20T and Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced, please use class Lens.
      设置MSX显示模式的级别。级别的范围为[0，100]。当它为0时，可见光谱定义是不可见的。当它是100时，视觉光谱的定义是最明显的。仅支持XT2相机和Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual。Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual不支持低于01.01.0520的固件版本。对于Zenmuse H20、Zenmuse H20T和Mavic 2 Enterprise Advanced，请使用类镜头。

      Input Parameters:
      @IntRange(from = 0, to = 100) int level The MSX level to set with range [0, 100].
      要设置的MSX级别范围为[0，100]。

      返回执行结果的执行回调。

      Dual Feed Vertical Alignment
      method
      setDualFeedVerticalAlignmentOffset
      method setDualFeedVerticalAlignmentOffset
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the vertical alignment offset between the video feeds from both the visual camera and the thermal camera. The alignment is applied to the MSX display mode. Different camera results in different value ranges. For XT2 camera, the valid range is [-8, 8]. For Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual, the valid range is [-40, 40]. Positive value will move the thermal window up. Use this setting to fine-tune the performance of MSX display mode and the align PIP mode. Only supported by XT2 camera and Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual.
      设置视觉摄像机和热摄像机的视频馈送之间的垂直对齐偏移。对齐应用于MSX显示模式。不同的相机会导致不同的值范围。对于XT2相机，有效范围为[-8，8]。对于Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual，有效范围为[-40，40]。正值将向上移动热窗口。使用此设置可微调MSX显示模式和对齐PIP模式的性能。仅支持XT2相机和Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual。

      Input Parameters:
      @IntRange(from = -40, to = 40) int offset Range from -8 to 8 for XT2, from -40 to 40 for Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual.
      XT2的范围从-8到8，Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual的范围从-40到40。
      @Nullable final CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned execution result.
      返回执行结果的执行回调。
      method
      getDualFeedVerticalAlignmentOffset
      method getDualFeedVerticalAlignmentOffset
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Gets the vertical alignment offset between the video feeds from both the visual camera and the thermal camera. The alignment is applied to the MSX display mode. Different camera results in different value ranges. For XT2 camera, the valid range is [-8, 8]. For Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual, the valid range is [-40, 40]. Positive value will move the thermal window up. Only supported by XT2 camera and Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual camera.
      获取视觉摄像机和热摄像机的视频源之间的垂直对齐偏移量。对齐应用于MSX显示模式。不同的相机会导致不同的值范围。对于XT2相机，有效范围为[-8，8]。对于Mavic 2 Enterprise Dual，有效范围为[-40，40]。正值将向上移动热窗口。仅支持XT2摄像头和Mavic 2 Enterprise双摄像头。

When recording video, it will been determined whether if current screen is recorded and which camera stream sources are recorded according the camera settings. The class of CameraStreamSettings is used to set the camera stream settings. Before calling this interface, you should set the camera mode to video mode. Only supported by Zenmuse H20 series.
      设置录制视频的摄像机流设置。录制视频时，将根据摄像机设置确定是否录制了当前屏幕以及录制了哪些摄像机流源。CameraStreamSettings类用于设置相机流设置。在调用此界面之前，您应该将相机模式设置为视频模式。仅支持Zenmuse H20系列。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull CameraStreamSettings streamSettings An object of CameraStreamSettings.
      CameraStreamSettings的对象。
      @Nullable final CommonCallbacks.CompletionCallback callback Callback that receives the setter execution result.
      接收setter执行结果的回调。

      Multispectral Shutter Speed
      method
      setMultispectralShutterSpeed
      method setMultispectralShutterSpeed
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Sets the shutter speed for the single-band sensors on the multispectral camera. The same shutter speed will be applied to all single-band sensors (sensors except the RGB one). To see all available shutter speed value settings, see ShutterSpeed. The shutter speed should not be set slower than the video frame rate when the camera's mode is RECORD_VIDEO. For example, if the video frame rate is 30fps, the shutter speed must be <= 1/30. Precondition: The shutter speed can be set only when the camera exposure mode is SHUTTER_PRIORITY mode. Only supported by multispectral camera of P4 Multispectral.
      设置多光谱相机上单波段传感器的快门速度。相同的快门速度将应用于所有单波段传感器（RGB传感器除外）。要查看所有可用的快门速度值设置，请参阅ShutterSpeed。当相机模式为RECORD_video时，快门速度不应设置为低于视频帧速率。例如，如果视频帧速率为30fps，则快门速度必须<=1/30。前提条件：只有当相机曝光模式为shutter_PRIORITY模式时，才能设置快门速度。仅由P4多光谱的多光谱相机支持。

      Input Parameters:
      SettingsDefinitions.ShutterSpeed shutterSpeed Shutter speed value to be set for the single-band sensors. For all available values shutterSpeed can be set to, please check ShutterSpeed. <br> The shutter speed should not be set slower than the video frame rate when the camera's mode is RECORD_VIDEO. For example, if the video frame rate = 30fps, then the shutterSpeed must be <= 1/30.
      要为单波段传感器设置的快门速度值。对于shutterSpeed可以设置为的所有可用值，请检查shutterSpeed
      当相机模式为RECORD_video时，快门速度不应设置为低于视频帧速率。例如，如果视频帧速率=30fps，则shutterSpeed必须<=1/30。

      Camera Calibration

      Enum Members:
      NOT_CALIBRATE If the camera lenses are not calibrated. Focusing action will be influenced. Please use calibration interface if you need.

      正在等待校准。
      OTHER The camera lens's state is unknown.

      Class Members:
      Calibration callback
      class
      CalibrationCallback
      Start Calibaration
      method
      startCalibration
      method startCalibration
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      If you encounter the following situation, please call this interface for camera calibration. Only supported by Zemmuse P1.
      1. Zemmuse P1 supports the replacement of a variety of fixed focus lenses, so when the lens is replaced, it is recommended that you recalibrate.
      2. Please listen the OnStateUpdate, if the status is NOT_CALIBRATE, please recalibrate.
      3. Please listen the hms error code, If you listen to the following error code, please recalibrate.
             hms_0x1C000D02: The camera calibration file failed to load, please perform infinity calibration.
             hms_0x1C000D03: Infinity focus calibration data expired. Recalibrate.
             hms_0x1C000D04: Infinity focus calibration data expired. Recalibrate.

      The following are the calibration steps:
      1. Take off and ascend to 102 meters (335ft) or higher to start calibration. Fly with caution.
      2. Call startCalibration interface. The state will change to WAITING_FOR_CALIBRATE.
      3. Set gimbal angle as -90 degrees(perpendicular to the ground). Call setFocusTarget interface to set the object with multiple distinct visual patterns at the center of the camera view as focus. Then the state will change to CALIBRATING.
      4. After finish the calibration, the state will change to CALIBRATED. You can use DJICameraCalibrateResult to listen the calibration result.
      如果您遇到以下情况，请调用此接口进行相机校准。仅Zemmuse P1支持。1.Zemmuse P1支持更换各种固定焦距镜头，因此更换镜头时，建议您重新校准。2.请收听OnStateUpdate，如果状态为NOT_CALIBRATE，请重新校准。3.请听hms错误代码，如果您听到以下错误代码，请重新校准。hms_0x1C000D02：无法加载相机校准文件，请执行无限校准。hms_0x1C000D03：无限聚焦校准数据过期。重新校准。hms_0x1C000D04：无限聚焦校准数据过期。重新校准。以下是校准步骤：1。起飞并上升至102米（335英尺）或更高，开始校准。小心飞行。2.调用startCalibration接口。状态将变为WAITING_FOR_CALIBRATE。3.将万向节角度设置为-90度（垂直于地面）。调用setFocusTarget接口，将相机视图中心具有多个不同视觉模式的对象设置为焦点。然后状态将变为CALIBRING（校准）。4.完成校准后，状态将更改为CALIBRATED（已校准）。您可以使用DJICameraCalibrateResult来监听校准结果。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull CommonCallbacks.CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned value(s).
      返回值的执行回调。

      Infinity Focus
      method
      calibratedInfinityFocus
      method calibratedInfinityFocus
      Package: dji.sdk.camera
      Description:

      Make sure you have calibrated the lens' infinity focusing with startCalibration. When in use, the lens uses infinity focus as calibrated. To help ensure focusing accuracy, recalibrate the infinity focus when there is a large temperature difference between the mission environment and the calibration environment (>15 degrees Celsius).
      确保您已使用startCalibration校准镜头的无限聚焦。使用时，镜头使用校准的无限焦距。为了帮助确保聚焦精度，当任务环境和校准环境之间存在较大温差（>15摄氏度）时，重新校准无限远焦点。

      Input Parameters:
      @NonNull CommonCallbacks.CompletionCallback callback The execution callback with the returned value(s).
      返回值的执行回调。

      method
      getIndex
      method getIndex
      Package: dji.sdk.base
      Description:

      Returns the component index. Index is zero based. A component will have an index greater than zero when there are multiple components of the same type on the DJI product, and one of the components already has the index 0. For instance, M210 can have two gimbal mounted cameras, and will therefore have two gimbal components with indices 0 and 1, and two camera components with indices 0 and 1. For Matrice 600, there are printed numbers on the battery boxes. The Battery component instance with index 0 corresponds to battery compartment number 1. For Inspire 2 and M200 series, Battery with index 0 corresponds to the battery on the port (left hand) side of the aircraft. For M210, M210 RTK and M300 RTK, Camera and Gimbal with index 0 corresponds to the camera and gimbal on the port (left hand) side of the aircraft. Lidar with index 0 corresponds to the lidar(Zenmuse L1) on the port (left hand) side of the aircraft.
      返回组件索引。索引从零开始。当DJI产品上有多个相同类型的组件，且其中一个组件的索引已为0时，组件的索引将大于零。例如，M210可以具有两个安装在万向节上的相机，因此将具有两个索引为0和1的万向节组件，以及两个索引0和1。对于Matrice 600，电池盒上有印刷数字。索引为0的电池组件实例对应于电池仓编号1。对于Inspire 2和M200系列，索引为0的电池对应于飞机左舷（左侧）的电池。对于M210、M210 RTK和M300 RTK，索引为0的相机和万向节对应于飞机左舷（左侧）的相机和转向架。索引为0的激光雷达对应于飞机左舷（左侧）的激光雷达（Zenmuse L1）。

      Return:
      int An int value of index.
      索引的int值。
